title: An article is sold at 25% profit. If its CP and SP are increased by 20 and 4 respectively, then the profit decreases 10%. What is the CP of the article? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let CP be X. SP will be 1.25X.(25%) profit. New CP is (X+20). New SP is (1.25X+4). New profit is 10% less is 15%. (SP-CP)*100/CP is profit. {(1.25X+4)-(X+20)}*100/(X+20)=15 (1.25X+4-X-20)*100=15(X+20) 25X-1600=15X+300. Solving for X we get 190. So cost price is Rs 190.00
